attractions.name: Baga Beach
attractions.short_description: Famous beach known for water sports and vibrant nightlife.

attractions.name: Basilica of Bom Jesus
attractions.short_description: UNESCO World Heritage site containing the remains of St. Francis Xavier.

attractions.name: Dudhsagar Falls
attractions.short_description: Majestic four-tiered waterfall located on the Mandovi River.

attractions.name: Fort Aguada
attractions.short_description: 17th-century Portuguese fort overlooking the Arabian Sea.

attractions.name: Anjuna Flea Market
attractions.short_description: Weekly market offering everything from clothes to handmade jewelry.

attractions.name: Palolem Beach
attractions.short_description: Crescent-shaped beach known for its calm waters and scenic beauty.

attractions.name: Mangueshi Temple
attractions.short_description: Beautiful Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Manguesh, an incarnation of Shiva.

attractions.name: Chapora Fort
attractions.short_description: Famous as the 'Dil Chahta Hai' fort, offering stunning sunset views.

attractions.name: Rohtang Pass
attractions.short_description: High mountain pass on the eastern Pir Panjal Range of the Himalayas.

attractions.name: Hadimba Devi Temple
attractions.short_description: Ancient wooden temple surrounded by cedar forests in Manali.

attractions.name: Solang Valley
attractions.short_description: Known for its summer and winter adventure sports like paragliding and skiing.

attractions.name: Mall Road, Shimla
attractions.short_description: The main street and social hub of the hill station Shimla.

attractions.name: Kasol
attractions.short_description: Small village on the banks of Parvati River, popular for trekking.

attractions.name: Spiti Valley
attractions.short_description: Cold desert mountain valley with ancient monasteries.

attractions.name: Dharamshala & McLeod Ganj
attractions.short_description: Residence of the Dalai Lama and center of Tibetan culture.

attractions.name: Great Himalayan National Park
attractions.short_description: UNESCO site known for its diverse flora and fauna and trekking trails.

attractions.name: Amer Fort
attractions.short_description: Majestic fort located on a hill, famous for its artistic style elements.

attractions.name: City Palace, Udaipur
attractions.short_description: Magnificent palace complex situated on the east bank of Lake Pichola.

attractions.name: Jaisalmer Fort
attractions.short_description: One of the very few 'living forts' in the world, built in the Thar Desert.

attractions.name: Hawa Mahal
attractions.short_description: The 'Palace of Breeze' known for its unique honeycomb-shaped windows.

attractions.name: Pushkar Lake
attractions.short_description: Sacred lake and major pilgrimage site for Hindus.

attractions.name: Mehrangarh Fort
attractions.short_description: Massive fort rising 400 feet above the city of Jodhpur.

attractions.name: Ranthambore National Park
attractions.short_description: One of the largest national parks in Northern India, famous for tigers.

attractions.name: Chittorgarh Fort
attractions.short_description: The largest fort in India and a symbol of Rajput bravery.

attractions.name: Alleppey Backwaters
attractions.short_description: Stunning network of lagoons and canals, best experienced on a houseboat.

attractions.name: Munnar Tea Gardens
attractions.short_description: Expansive tea plantations offering breathtaking views and trekking.

attractions.name: Wayanad Wildlife Sanctuary
attractions.short_description: Biodiversity hotspot with elephants, tigers, and diverse avian life.

attractions.name: Fort Kochi
attractions.short_description: Historical area known for its colonial charm and Chinese fishing nets.

attractions.name: Varkala Beach
attractions.short_description: Unique beach with cliffs adjacent to the Arabian Sea.

attractions.name: Athirappilly Falls
attractions.short_description: Nicknamed 'The Niagara of India', a massive and beautiful waterfall.

attractions.name: Thekkady (Periyar)
attractions.short_description: Famous for the Periyar National Park and boat safaris on the lake.

attractions.name: Padmanabhaswamy Temple
attractions.short_description: One of the richest temples in the world, dedicated to Lord Vishnu.
